APS_EstablishKeyConf_t Struct Reference

Parameters of a callback for the APS_EstablishKeyReq() function. More...

#include <aps.h>

Data Fields

ExtAddr_t address
APS_SkkeStatus_t status

Detailed Description

Parameters of a callback for the APS_EstablishKeyReq() function.

The structure conforms to APSME-KEY-ESTABLISH.confirm primitive defined in ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.6, page 443.

Definition at line 111 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_EstablishKeyConf_t::address

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device with which the key-establishment protocol was executed.

Definition at line 115 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.

APS_SkkeStatus_t APS_EstablishKeyConf_t::status

This parameter indicates the final status of the key-establishment protocol.

Definition at line 118 of file apsmeEstablishKey.h.
